text: Doix-lès-Fontaines is a commune. It is found in the region Pays de la Loire in the Vendée department in the west of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of Doix (the seat) and Fontaines.Arrêté préfectoral 3 December 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Vendée
title: Doix-lès-Fontaines
